sentences.en: All living things exist within this region, the biosphere.
sentences.cn: 所有生物都存在于这一地区, 这就是所说的生物圈.

sentences.en: Biosphere 2 was ultimately ridiculed as a research debade, as exfravagant pseudoscience.
sentences.cn: 生物圈2号最终被讥讽为科研上的大失败, 代价是昂贵的伪科学.

sentences.en: But what climate change shows us is that we are not in control, either of the biosphere or of the machine which is destroying it.
sentences.cn: 然而，气候变化向我们显示，无论是在生物圈还是摧毁生物圈的制度模式，我们都不处于控制地位。

sentences.en: Deep - sea nature zoology is the component that distinctive configuration, structure and function have in biosphere.
sentences.cn: 海洋的自然生态是生物圈中具有独特形态 、 结构和功能的组成部分.

sentences.en: He enraged biologists by considering the biosphere of living creatures as a large chemical factory.
sentences.cn: 他把生物居住的生物圈看做巨型的化工厂,生物学家对此甚为不满.

sentences.en: If you start with a vision of the economy as a subsystem of the larger biosphere, as it grows, it takes into itself more and more of the total system.
sentences.cn: 如果你开始将经济看作是更大生物圈下的一个子系统，随着不断的发展，它从整个系统中汲取的资源也越来越多。

sentences.en: It is within the biosphere that the life forms of earth, including humans, live.
sentences.cn: 包括人类 在内 的地球生物生活在这个生物圈内.

sentences.en: Life - sustaining resources -- air, food , and water -- are withdrawn from the biosphere.
sentences.cn: 以气体 、 液体或固体形式出现的废物同样也是排入生物圈.

sentences.en: Oil and gas occurrence is tightly related with the Earth biosphere presence.
sentences.cn: 油气分布与地球生物圈的存在紧密相关.

sentences.en: On Mars, I would only want to live in an artificial biosphere.
sentences.cn: 在火星, 我只想生活在人造生物圈.

sentences.en: The Biosphere 2 project in Arizona swarms with hyperlife, as do Tierra, and Terminator 2.
sentences.cn: 亚利桑那的生物圈二号项目(Biosphere2project)到处都是超生命,高山气候带系统(Tierra) 和终结者2号(Terminator2)也一样.

sentences.en: The biosphere is being destroyed by economic growth!
sentences.cn: 经济增长正在破坏生物圈!

sentences.en: The carbon cycle is the biogeochemical cycle by which carbon is exchanged among the biosphere, pedosphere, geosphere, hydrosphere, and atmosphere of the Earth.
sentences.cn: 碳循环是一个生物地质化学循环圈，碳通过此循环在生物圈、土壤圈、地层、水圈、大气中交流。

sentences.en: The entire biosphere was becoming more transparent.
sentences.cn: 整个生物圈越来越透明。

sentences.en: The image of the Biosphere had shifted again ; it was a little out of her control.
sentences.cn: 真正的生物圈——像整个世界一样的——还是假的生物圈?

sentences.en: The impact of modern technology on the biosphere is evident worldwide.
sentences.cn: 现代技术对生物圈的影响在全世界是明显的.

sentences.en: The whole biosphere , like the individual organisms that liveinside it, exists in a chemically dynamic state.
sentences.cn: 整个生物界, 就像生存于其中的每个有机体一样, 是处于一种化学的动态中.

sentences.en: We are in the early stages of a transformation from ideological consciousness to biosphere consciousness.
sentences.cn: 我们正处在从思想意识转型到生物圈意识的早期阶段.

words.tran_cn: [生物] 生物分类学；[生物] 生物系统学

trans.tran_en: the part of the world in which animals, plants etc can live
